title: Gemstones for snowdown 2016
body: Are you able to receive gemstones in all of the new featured boxes or are they only avalible in the normal hextech-boxes?

replies.body:
It looks like all the Hextech-styled boxes can potentially contain a gemstone, but have the same odds of giving you one as a normal hextech box. For more information on the crafting side of this event, check out [**this guide.**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016)

Let me know if you have any questions!
